verses.text: \w How|strong="H4100"\w* beautiful \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* feet \w in|strong="H7725"\w* sandals, prince’s daughter! \w Your|strong="H7725"\w* rounded thighs \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w like|strong="H7725"\w* jewels, \w the|strong="H7725"\w* work \w of|strong="H4264"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* hands \w of|strong="H4264"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* skilful workman.

\w Your|strong="H3027"\w* \w body|strong="H3409"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w round|strong="H4639"\w* goblet, no mixed wine \w is|strong="H4100"\w* wanting. \w Your|strong="H3027"\w* waist \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* heap \w of|strong="H1323"\w* wheat, \w set|strong="H4639"\w* \w about|strong="H3027"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* lilies.
Your two breasts are \w like|strong="H7799"\w* two fawns, that are twins \w of|strong="H6194"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* roe.

Your neck is \w like|strong="H7699"\w* an ivory tower. Your eyes \w are|strong="H8147"\w* \w like|strong="H7699"\w* \w the|strong="H8147"\w* pools \w in|strong="H8147"\w* Heshbon \w by|strong="H8147"\w* \w the|strong="H8147"\w* gate \w of|strong="H8147"\w* Bathrabbim. Your nose is \w like|strong="H7699"\w* \w the|strong="H8147"\w* tower \w of|strong="H8147"\w* Lebanon which looks towards Damascus.

\w Your|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H6440"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H5869"\w* \w like|strong="H5921"\w* Carmel. \w The|strong="H6440"\w* hair \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H6440"\w* \w like|strong="H5921"\w* purple. \w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H5869"\w* held captive \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* tresses.
How beautiful \w and|strong="H4428"\w* how pleasant \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H4428"\w*, love, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* delights!
\w This|strong="H4100"\w*, \w your|strong="H4100"\w* stature, \w is|strong="H4100"\w* like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* palm tree, \w your|strong="H4100"\w* breasts like its fruit.

\w I|strong="H1819"\w* said, “\w I|strong="H1819"\w* will climb up into \w the|strong="H1819"\w* \w palm|strong="H8558"\w* \w tree|strong="H8558"\w*. \w I|strong="H1819"\w* will take hold \w of|strong="H6967"\w* its fruit.” Let your \w breasts|strong="H7699"\w* be \w like|strong="H1819"\w* clusters \w of|strong="H6967"\w* \w the|strong="H1819"\w* vine, \w the|strong="H1819"\w* smell \w of|strong="H6967"\w* your breath \w like|strong="H1819"\w* apples.

\w Your|strong="H4994"\w* mouth \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* best wine, \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w goes|strong="H5927"\w* down smoothly \w for|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* beloved, gliding \w through|strong="H4994"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* lips \w of|strong="H1612"\w* \w those|strong="H1961"\w* who \w are|strong="H1961"\w* asleep. Beloved
\w I|strong="H1980"\w* \w am|strong="H1980"\w* \w my|strong="H1980"\w* \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w*’s. \w His|strong="H1980"\w* desire \w is|strong="H2896"\w* towards \w me|strong="H1980"\w*.

Come, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w*! Let’s go \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* field. Let’s lodge \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* villages.

\w Let|strong="H3212"\w*’s \w go|strong="H3212"\w* early \w up|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* vineyards. \w Let|strong="H3212"\w*’s see whether \w the|strong="H3318"\w* vine \w has|strong="H3318"\w* budded, \w its|strong="H3318"\w* blossom \w is|strong="H1730"\w* open, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* pomegranates are \w in|strong="H3212"\w* flower. \w There|strong="H3885"\w* \w I|strong="H3212"\w* \w will|strong="H7704"\w* \w give|strong="H7704"\w* \w you|strong="H3212"\w* \w my|strong="H3318"\w* \w love|strong="H1730"\w*.

\w The|strong="H7200"\w* mandrakes \w produce|strong="H5414"\w* fragrance. \w At|strong="H7200"\w* \w our|strong="H5414"\w* doors \w are|strong="H8033"\w* \w all|strong="H7200"\w* kinds \w of|strong="H3754"\w* precious fruits, new \w and|strong="H7925"\w* old, \w which|strong="H8033"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* \w stored|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H8033"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*, \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w*.
